Hi, I’m Bhargavi

title: About
text:
Home About Projects CV Contact




Introduction


I’m a graduate student pursuing my Master’s in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University. I enjoy exploring how data reveals patterns, supports better decisions, and drives meaningful outcomes.


My interests lie in business analytics — using data visualization, statistical modeling, and process optimization to translate complex data into clear, actionable insights.
